name: iWeb Website Design Project
summary: Learn about .SITES files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: As iWeb users create websites, those websites are stored in SITES files. iWeb saves SITES files to the /​[user]/​Library/​Application Support/​iWeb directory without prompting users for a save location.
NOTE: iWeb is part of Apple's iLife application suite.

description: A SITES file is a website design project created in iWeb, a web development program for novice developers. It contains webpage layouts, text, and graphics. SITES files can be published to a live website when complete, and they are similar to .SITES2 files.
